function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased risk of spreading contagious diseases through physical interaction in retail spaces.","Impact":"Higher risk of disease transmission and potential for outbreaks within retail environments.","Mitigation":"Implementing contactless technologies and reducing physical interactions through cashier-less checkout and virtual try-on technology.","Technologies":"Contactless payment systems, computer vision technology for virtual try-on, cashier-less checkout systems.","People":"Consumers, retail workers, store employees, and shoppers.","Owner":"Retailers, e-commerce platforms, technology providers."},{"Description":"Lack of personalized experiences leading to customer dissatisfaction and reduced loyalty.","Impact":"Reduced customer satisfaction, lower conversion rates, and decreased customer loyalty.","Mitigation":"Personalizing the customer experience through empathy, tailored recommendations, and virtual try-on technology.","Technologies":"Computer vision technology, personalized recommendation algorithms, virtual try-on technology.","People":"Consumers, retailers, e-commerce platforms.","Owner":"Retailers, e-commerce platforms."}]}
